trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown" /> event and the <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown" /> 이벤트 및 <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded" /> 이벤트에 대한 이벤트 데이터가 들어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.AppDomain> 인스턴스가 종료 되거나, 언로드되는 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> 이벤트 또는 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> 이벤트가 각각.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> 개체 종료 또는 언로드에 대 한 이유를 저장 하 고 해당 매개 변수 중 하나로 이벤트 처리기에 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅되는 응용 프로그램 도메인이 종료된 이유입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs" /> class.

This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다. <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> 와 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> 속성이로 설정 `reason`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅되는 응용 프로그램 도메인이 종료된 이유를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> 속성 저장소는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> 이유를 설명 하는 값으로 개체는 <xref:System.AppDomain> 인스턴스가 종료 되었습니다.
